alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:08PM EDT until June 15 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 615 PM EDT/515 PM CDT/. * At 508 PM EDT/408 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southeast of Cottonwood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Donalsonville, Marianna, Quincy, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Greensboro, Malone, Sneads, Gretna, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Iron City, Brinson, Bascom, Douglas City, Recovery, Lovedale, Dellwood and Donaldsonville A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
